subject: Football
Fines (Penalties)
lead_paragraph: Plaxico Burress was fined $45,000 by the N.F.L. on Friday for verbally abusing an official and tossing a ball into the stands during last Sunday’s victory against the San Francisco 49ers.
snippet: Plaxico Burress was fined $45,000 by the N.F.L. on Friday for verbally abusing an official and tossing a ball into the stands during last Sunday’s victory against the San Francisco 49ers.
